page.title: 18TOURISM
page.content: CARNOUSTIE IS EVER POPULAR AS A SUMMER RESORT.THE MAIN ATTRACTION FOR VISITORS IS THE BEACH AND THE MAGNIFICENT GOLF COURSE.THE AIR COULD BE DESCRIBEB AS BRACING.RAINFALL BELOW THE SCOTTISH AVERAGE AND THE SEA TEMPRATURE IS USUALLY ABOUT 60 DEGREES IN JULY AND AUGUST. GOLF HAS BEEN PLAYED ON THE LINKS SINCE THE 16th CENTURY WHEN SIR ROBERT DE MAULE "WENT OFTYMES TO BARRIE LINKS WHEN THE WAD-FIE(STAKES) WAS FOR DRINK " THE CARNOUSTIE AND THE TAYMOUTH WERE THE FIRST GOLF CLUBS BEING ESTABLISHED IN 1842 CONSISTING FOR A LONG TIME OF 9 HOLES NOWADAYS CARNOUSTIE GOLF COURSES ARE WELL KNOWN THROUGHOUT THE GOLFING WORLD.
